title: Then Why Do I Have Toenails?: How to Be the Best Atheist You Can Be.
description: A personal explanation for why the author became an Atheist, an honest appeal against the literal acceptance of holy scripture, and self-help guide for would-be Atheists. With short stories and "doodle time" interactive projects to help curb the fear of crossing the boundaries of sacredness.
author: Thom Phelps
